ModMetaData.name: Elders Faction AddOn - Anima Alchemy
ModMetaData.author: TM3
ModMetaData.description: This is an Add-on for the great mod "Elders Faction" by xrushha. It is a hard dependency as it uses the farmable anima fibers for the drug recipes. This is my first try at modding with a shallow programming knowledge at best, so any constructive feedback is welcome. Needless to say it is a work in progress. Enjoy! - Peace
